title: Simple and elegant
comment: Does what it says smoothy. Nice work!

title: Automatic login by WiFi state is very handy
comment: Yesterday I was coming back from college, and I really it when my mails were delivered before I hit the hostel gate because this app automatically logged me in.   Plus in my hostel sometimes when the WiFi gets disconnected, the user is logged out instantly. This feature comes handy in that case too. And the fact that you can send multiple request using the main screen just increases my chances of getting logged in when the traffic is high on university servers.

title: Awesome App
comment: Very Intuitive and handy app. Option for multi login id's and persistent notification is nice thought.
